Data Import¶

Download the extract the latest North Carolina data dump into <git-repo>/data/nc.

cd data/
unzip -d nc raw-data.zip
sudo chmod 666 nc/*

Convert space-delineated files to CSVs with the help of csvkit and create-schema.py:

python create-schema.py

This will create data/nc/csv.

Make sure our database is in the right state before importing:

dropdb traffic_stops;
createdb -E UTF-8 traffic_stops
python manage.py syncdb --noinput
python manage.py migrate stops 0001

Now use PostgreSQL’s COPY command to load our data:

psql --set=data_dir="$PWD/nc/csv" -f import.sql traffic_stops
